```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Packages

```{r packages}
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
```

# data load

```{r data load}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2021-03-16')
games <- tuesdata$games
```

# clean
```{r clean}
sort_by_perc <- games %>%
mutate(avg_peak_perc = as.numeric(gsub('\\%','',avg_peak_perc))) %>%
  arrange(desc(avg_peak_perc))
head(sort_by_perc)
range(sort_by_perc$year,na.rm=TRUE)
```
